overview: A  documentary film that examines sexual persecution and violence against women throughout history within various cultures that places the blame of the existence of evil solely on the Eve figure from the Christian bible. It also takes a look at modern day victim blaming and systematic misogyny in music and media.
tagline: For all the shame we hide. For all the blame assigned. It's time we have our say. On how we are defined.
title: The Rise of Eve
